solution_line_template: The clothes take {clothes_minutes} minutes to wash and the towels take twice as long, {clothes_minutes} x {towels_multiplier} = <<{clothes_minutes}*{towels_multiplier}={towels_minutes}>>{towels_minutes} minutes to wash the towels.

The sheets take {sheets_less_than_towels} minutes less than the towels, {towels_minutes} - {sheets_less_than_towels} = <<{towels_minutes}-{sheets_less_than_towels}={sheets_minutes}>>{sheets_minutes} minutes to wash the sheets.

It takes {clothes_minutes} minutes + {towels_minutes} minutes + {sheets_minutes} minutes = <<{clothes_minutes}+{towels_minutes}+{sheets_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes to wash everything.
